```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(ggthemes)

theme_set(theme_few(base_size = 12))

```

```{r sachs, warning = FALSE}
process_age <- function(age) {
  age_list <- sub("\\['P", "", age) %>%
    sub("D'\\]", "", .) %>%
    str_split(., "[:alpha:]") %>%
    unlist()
  
  as.numeric(age_list[1]) * 365.25 + as.numeric(age_list[2]) * 30.5 +
    as.numeric(age_list[3])
     
}

braunwald_utts <- read_csv(here("data/braunwald_utterance_data.csv")) %>%
  mutate(error = as.logical(error),
         response_time = as.numeric(response_time)) %>%
  filter(abs(response_time) <= 3) 

child_data <- braunwald_utts %>%
  filter(speaker == "CHI" & responder != "CHI" & (past_tense | plural ))

child_data
```

```{r response-times}
ggplot(child_data, aes(x = response_time, color = error))  +
  geom_density()
```
